item.title: Resident Evil 2, Resident Evil 3, Resident Evil 7 biohazard Gold Edition PS5 physical editions announced
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/10/resident-evil-2-resident-evil-3-resident-evil-7-biohazard-gold-edition-ps5-physical-editions-announced

  • PS5

Due out in December in Europe and Japan, January in North America.

Capcom will release physical editions of Resident Evil 2, Resident Evil 3, and Resident Evil 7 biohazard Gold Edition for PlayStation 5 on December 6, 2024 in Europe, Australia, New Zealand, and Asia, December 26, 2024 in Japan, and in January 2025 in North America, the company announced. Each title will be priced at $29.99 / 3,289 yen.

All three titles are currently available digitally as a standalone purchase, or as a free upgrade to the physical or digital edition of the PlayStation 4 version.

(Box art via @Billbil_kun.)
